Notes.Text:
This update for ffmpeg-4 fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2023-50010: Fixed an arbitrary code execution via the set_encoder_id() (bsc#1223256).
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability in Ffmpeg v.n6.1-3-g466799d4f5 allows a local attacker to execute arbitrary code via the set_encoder_id function in /fftools/ffmpeg_enc.c component.
